title: LEGO Masters
overview: Ambitious building block fans of all ages can put their skills to the test in the show. With access to over a million Lego bricks, candidates can show that they are unbeatable in originality, skill and perseverance. After a season moderated by Oliver Geissen, which was shown the evening before, Daniel Hartwich took over the moderation of the show, which will now run in prime time.
